data.title: Helstons HELSTONS JAKE SPEED LEATHER JACKET
meta_keywords: Jacket;SMOOTH LEATHER;LEATHER JACKET;cloth;Textile trousers;clothing;leathercloth;leatherclothes;leatherclothing;bike;moto;SET;motorcyclejacket;urban;city;chopper;cruiser;cruising;vintage;retro;FOR BMW VINTAGE BIKES
data.meta_description: Buy Helstons HELSTONS JAKE SPEED LEATHER JACKET at Louis Moto for a great price. Top brands ✓ Great selection ✓ No risk ✓ Secure payment ✓ 2 year return policy ✓
data.text:
The good old days when the motorcycle jackets were still made of strong, solid buffalo leather, this time has brought back Helstons with the *Jake Speed* men's motorcycle jacket. With exactly the topstitching and decorative stripes as you know them from vintage jackets. In addition, the valuable Helstons embroidery on the chest. It underlines the special retro look of the *Jake Speed*. This great piece is especially designed for lovers of vintage motorcycles, custom motorcycles, café racers, etc. You can ride it through all seasons, because the *Jake Speed* is equipped with a water repellent rain membrane and a removable sleeveless thermal aluminum vest.

Comfort/Features:

Men's cut buffalo leather

water repellent membrane made of 100% polyester

removable thermo-aluminum vest with document and cell phone pocket

adjustable waistband and cuffs

all around connection zipper

2 non-waterproof outer pockets

2 inside pockets

Protection:

removable protectors on shoulders, elbows and back

elbow protectors height adjustable

Material:

high quality buffalo leather, 1,1 mm to 1,2 mm thick

Material reinforcement on shoulders

inside 1): 59 % cotton, 31 % polyester, 10 % polyamide

Inside 2): 94 % polyester, 6 % polyamide, aluminum
